Fandom

Class Fandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fandom.Fandom

  • public class Fandom
extends java.lang.Object
    The Fandom instance represents a Fandom community.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mika Thein
    See Also:
    Fandom(String), getPage(long), getArticle(long), getUser(long)

        public static boolean PRINT_WARNINGS
        Whether warnings should be printed.
        See Also:
        DEBUG, RESET_STORAGE

      • RESET_STORAGE

        public static boolean RESET_STORAGE
        Whether the storage of recent activities of a Fandom community should be cleared after a new Fandom instance was created.

        If this value is true, all listeners may react on events they already have reacted on every time a new instance is being created.

        See Also:
        DEBUG, PRINT_WARNINGS

      • baseUrl

        public final java.lang.String baseUrl
        The base URL of the Fandom including the server name and language (optional).

        Examples:
        disney.fandom.com
        avatar.fandom.com/de

        See Also:
        root, lang, name

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fandom

        public Fandom(java.lang.String fandomUrl)
        Creates a new Fandom instance. The argument has to match the following regular expression pattern: 
        [a-z-]+\.fandom\.com[/a-z-]*
        It should look like "fandom-id.fandom.com[/lang]"
        Examples:
        disney.fandom.com
        avatar.fandom.com/de
        Parameters:
        fandomUrl - the server name and language (optional)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - if fandomUrl does not match the regular expression or the length is larger than 50 characters or shorter than 3 characters
        NotFoundException - if the FANDOM couldn't be found
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if something else went wrong (set DEBUG to true to receive more information)
        See Also:
        baseUrl

      • getNamespaces

        public Element[] getNamespaces()
        Returns the namespaces as Element-Array.

        Note: This does not update the namespace constants (like NAMESPACE_MAIN).

        If you're unfamiliar with namespaces, check community.fandom.com/wiki/Help:Namespace.

        Returns:
        the namespaces as Element-Array with the namespace ID as key and the namespace title as value
        See Also:
        NAMESPACE_MAIN, NAMESPACE_SPECIAL, NAMESPACE_USER, NAMESPACE_CATEGORY, NAMESPACE_FILE

      • getRandomPageId

        public long getRandomPageId(int namespace)
        Returns a random page ID with namespace namespace.
        If you're unfamiliar with namespaces, check community.fandom.com/wiki/Help:Namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace
        Returns:
        a random page ID
        See Also:
        getRandomPageId(), NAMESPACE_MAIN, NAMESPACE_SPECIAL, NAMESPACE_USER
